attributes.action: Prosecute women whom lie to courts to alienate their children's father's
attributes.additional_details: I would like all women whom lie to the courts and or the police to purposely alienate their children from their father's to face criminal action. I believe anyone found guilty of this should either face prison time or at the very least have to pay back all costs to the courts and police due to this false action.
attributes.background: I currently have been subject to a constant miscarriage of justice at the hands of the supposed justice system due to unchecked lies from my ex meaning complete alienation from my children
